Text: RE Cc Chriswe did administer a frequent flyer VIP program for them but they cancelled the contract with us when a rouge hued young man scrapped his pink sun burnt nose on the seat in front of him whilst flying through some turbulence The giant scab resulted in several plastic surgeries and never really healed Their insurance premiums went through the roof and as a result they cancelled our program I am now working on a program for Canada free chiropractic adjustment for every minutes of flying time hoping to close this one soon Just an FYI Original Message From chris mcconvey mailto Sent May AM To Joseph GGalea Cc Charles Jones James Galea James McDonnell Mark Wilson Fehler Mary JUS Evelyn Galea Brad Hall DARREN TRELOAR Subject Re Joe great news forgot to ask you how the Aeroflot sp service was on your first trip over Is it true the Matthew Scott Company is doing some promotionalincentive partner programs with them led by MMMMMMMMAACCCKKKKERRR Joseph GGalea wrote Diane and I are thrilled to announce that we will be travelling to Russia for the nd and final time for a few years anyway to pick up our son Yanic We will be leaving on Friday June th with our court appearance on June and our flight home to Toronto on June Thanks to all for your kind words and sentiments over the last few months REGARDS Joseph Galea McGown Intermac Inc Bloor Street East Suite Toronto Ontario MW B Ph Fax
